name: Tesco Finest 18 Pork Cocktail Sausages 292G
description: Our Finest Irish Pork Sausages are made with prime cuts of Irish Pork, hand butchered and blended with our Finest Seasoning, free from artificial colour, falvours and MSG.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill><Time>12-14 mins</Time><Instructions>● Remove all packaging. ● For Best Results do not prick sausage skins. ● Place under a pre-heated medium/high grill for 12-14 minutes, turning occasionally.</Instructions></Grill><Shallow_Fry><Time>8-10 mins</Time><Instructions>● Remove all packaging. ● For Best Results do not prick sausage skins. ● Fry in a little oil over a medium heat for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally. ● Drain Well before serving. </Instructions></Shallow_Fry><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Cooking_Precautions>All appliances vary, these are guidelines only.Tesco recommends that all meat products are cooked thoroughly.Not suitable for microwave cooking.Not suitable for cooking from frozen.</Cooking_Precautions></Cooking_Instructions><Freezing_Instructions><Freezing_Guidelines>Freeze on day of purchase.
